A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Boring\, convoluted\, and absolutely exhausting. I wanted to leave 30 minutes in but forced (lol) myself to stay hoping the film would turn a corner. It never did. It was little more than a bad Marvel Star Wars movie.

Pros:
- Kylo (Adam Driver was outstanding and his scenes were the best in the film).
- That one explosion.
- Porgs.

Cons:
- "Oh hey! The force can do all sorts of stuff we never thought to mention before in any other movie!"
- The Leia thing.
- The Luke thing.
- Hawkes
- Snoke
- Casino planet.
- Everything that happened on that stupid island.
- Poe's wisecracks (the writing in general)

Last bit: I know it's a Star Wars movie and Star Wars movies don't care about science\, reality\, or consistency\, but space doesn't work that way.
